Purpose: To quantitatively measure Factor H autoantibodies in serum for the diagnosis and management of conditions associated with autoimmune activity against Factor H.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., plain red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Microtiter plate reader (450 nm), incubator (37 Â°C), plate washer or manual washing station, pipettes, vortex mixer, timer
